mapper.select: SELECT ta.id id, ta.file_id fileId, ta.countdown countdown, ta.create_time createTime, ta.href href, ta.jumpable jumpable, ta.phone_type phoneType, ta.state state, tf.`name` name, tf.path filePath from t_advert ta LEFT JOIN t_file tf ON tf.id=ta.file_id WHERE ta.phone_type=#{phoneType} and ta.state=1 ORDER BY ta.id DESC
